name: FLEX4Me
description: Show the FLEX toolbar on the fly by force touching the status bar, the app doesn't need to be enabled in FLEXible preferences. No options to configure.

1.3: Updates for FLEXible 2.1.0 (Shmoopi changed the FLEXible.dylib directory)
1.2: Now can use on the lockscreen (use TouchID or FaceID to 'unlock' and it will appear)
